p: The present work revealed there was a significant effect of growing locations on micronutrients status of KLL ( Table 8). Leaves harvested from West Bandung had the highest levels of iron (Fe), manganese (Mn), copper (Cu) and zinc (Zn). This could be associated with the acidic character of the West Bandung soil ( Table 4). The high solubility and plant uptake of micronutrient is often reported in acid soil [ 52, 53]. Our work also reported there was a negative, strong, and significant (Î± 1%) correlation between certain micronutrients, i.e., Fe, Mn and Zn to leaf N content.
